text: The 1985 Men's Hockey Champions Trophy was the seventh edition of the Hockey Champions Trophy, an international men's field hockey tournament. It took place from 16 to 24 November 1985 in Perth, Western Australia. The hosts Australia won their third title in a row by finishing first in the round-robin tournament. ==Results== \---- \---- \---- \---- \---- \---- \---- ==Statistics== ===Final standings=== # # # # # # ===Goalscorers=== ==External links== *Official FIH website Champions Trophy Champions Trophy Category:International field hockey competitions hosted by Australia Category:Champions Trophy (field hockey) Category:Sports competitions in Perth, Western Australia Category:1980s in Perth, Western Australia Category:November 1985 sports events in Oceania
title: 1985 Men's Hockey Champions Trophy
